Articles.Content: OK I'v been playing for awhile and since the last update 90. I'm having problems with my larger ships breaking apart I have search and found that this has been going on for some time but have not found a way to fix said problem. can someone help with thia as it is now almost impossible for me t play the game

Serious lack of information going on here, please see the How-To-Get-Support sticky.

Isn't bold and italic for the whole post a bit of overkill?
Yeah Steve is right we need more info, how can we tell what is causing your craft to break apart otherwise?
